sensitivity: EV-2 to EV17 (at ISO100 equivalent with F1.4 lens attached), EV -1 to 18 (at ISO100 equivalent, with F2.8 lens attached)
storage: Memory Stick PRO Duo, Memory Stick PRO-HG Duo, Memory Stick XC-HG Duo, SD memory card, SDHC memory card, SDXC memory card
